alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:46AM CDT until August 12 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Southwestern Madison County in southwestern Illinois... St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Franklin County in east central Missouri... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 446 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Glasgow Village to Fenton to Villa Ridge, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Louis, Belleville, Granite City, O`Fallon, East St. Louis, Collinsville, Edwardsville, Arnold, Fairview Heights, Cahokia, Swansea, Glen Carbon, Shiloh, Festus, Eureka, Troy, Waterloo, Columbia, Maryville, and Mascoutah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 27. Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 251 and 253. Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 191. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site, Robertsville State Park, and Horseshoe Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
